text: Francis Anthony Sullivan, S.J. (May 21, 1922 - October 23, 2019) was an American Catholic theologian and a Jesuit priest. He was best known for his research in the area of ecclesiology and the magisterium. He was born in Boston, Massachusetts. Sullivan died on October 23, 2019 at a hospital in Weston, Connecticut at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American theologians Category:American Jesuits Category:Writers from Boston
title: Francis A. Sullivan
